>>Weather Surgut

The weather conditions in Surgut are characterized by a chilly and moderate climate. Surgut has a significant amount of rainfall during the year. This is true even for the driest month. According to the Köppen-Geiger classification, the prevailing climate in this region is categorized as Dfb. The mean temperature prevailing in the city of Surgut is recorded as -1.8 °C | 28.8 °F, according to statistical data. The precipitation level on a yearly basis amounts to 652 mm | 25.7 inch as per the meteorological records.

The location Surgut is in the northern hemisphere. Summer begins at the end of June and ends in September. The months of summer are: June, July, August, September.

Climate graph // Weather by Month Surgut

During February, the amount of precipitation is at its lowest, with only 26 mm | 1.0 inch recorded. With an average of 103 mm | 4.1 inch, the most precipitation falls in August.

average temperature by month Surgut

The month of maximum warmth in a year is July. The average temperature during this period reaches up to 17.2 °C | 62.9 °F, making it the hottest time of the year. January has the lowest average temperature of the year. It is -21.1 °C | -5.9 °F.

The variation in precipitation between the months with the lowest and highest levels of rainfall is 77 mm | 3 inch, as observed. During the year, the average temperatures vary by 38.2 °C | 68.8 °F.

It has been determined that November exhibits the highest relative humidity, with a percentage of 85.37. On the other hand, it is observed that during June, there is an extremely low level of relative humidity at only 69.36 percent. The wettest month is August (14.90 days), whilst the driest is February (8.07).
